scenes.title: Medicine Cat's Den
scenes.description: You are inside a cool, sandy den beneath the roots of a great willow tree. The air smells of dried thyme and comfrey. Dappledleaf, the medicine cat, is pacing anxiously near her store of herbs.
scenes.image_prompt: Equirectangular 360° panorama, ultra coherent series look, subtle ethereal style cartoon, ink drawings with watercolor. Interior of a den under tree roots, woven reeds, dried herbs hanging from roots, filtered light coming from entrance. East is forward.

scenes.title: Dappledleaf's Request
scenes.description: Dappledleaf looks at you with wide, amber eyes. 'Thank StarClan you're here! Greypaw has a terrible cough, and I am out of Catmint. It only grows in the abandoned Twoleg garden across the river. Please, cross the Stepping Stones and bring some back before nightfall!'
scenes.image_prompt: Close up 2D image, subtle ethereal style cartoon, ink drawings with watercolor. A tortoiseshell she-cat with a worried expression, background of dried herbs and sandy den walls.

scenes.title: RiverClan Camp
scenes.description: The camp is bustling with activity. Sleek, well-fed cats share tongues on sun-warmed rocks. To the South lies the Medicine Den. To the North, the reed tunnel leads out to the river.
scenes.image_prompt: Equirectangular 360° panorama, ultra coherent series look, subtle ethereal style cartoon, ink drawings with watercolor. A clearing surrounded by tall reeds and willow trees, river stones, cats lounging. East is forward.

scenes.title: The Riverbank
scenes.description: The river flows swiftly here, shimmering under the sun. Tall reeds sway in the breeze. To the North, a line of slippery stones creates a path across the water.
scenes.image_prompt: Equirectangular 360° panorama, ultra coherent series look, subtle ethereal style cartoon, ink drawings with watercolor. Wide river bank, rushing blue water, tall green reeds, willow branches dipping into water. East is forward.

scenes.title: The Stepping Stones
scenes.description: You balance precariously on the wet stones. The water rushes loudly around you. Ahead to the North lies the overgrown bank of the Twolegplace.
scenes.image_prompt: Equirectangular 360° panorama, ultra coherent series look, subtle ethereal style cartoon, ink drawings with watercolor. POV from middle of river standing on a stone, rushing water all around, wooden fence visible on far bank. East is forward.

scenes.title: Abandoned Twoleg Garden
scenes.description: An overgrown garden behind a wooden fence. It smells strange and musty. Weeds choke the stone paths. In the corner, near a crumbling wall, you see a patch of leafy green plants.
scenes.image_prompt: Equirectangular 360° panorama, ultra coherent series look, subtle ethereal style cartoon, ink drawings with watercolor. Overgrown garden, tall grass, wooden fences, crumbling brick wall, wild nature reclaiming a yard. East is forward.

scenes.title: Patch of Catmint
scenes.description: You found it! Soft, fuzzy leaves with a strong, aromatic scent. This is the Catmint Dappledleaf needs.
scenes.image_prompt: Close up 2D image, subtle ethereal style cartoon, ink drawings with watercolor. A patch of catmint (nepeta) with soft grey-green leaves and small purple flowers growing among tall grass.

scenes.title: Mission Accomplished!
scenes.description: Dappledleaf purrs loudly as you drop the bundle of Catmint at her paws. 'You've saved Greypaw! You are a true warrior of RiverClan.' The clan will eat well tonight in your honor!
scenes.image_prompt: Close up 2D image, subtle ethereal style cartoon, ink drawings with watercolor. Dappledleaf looking happy and grateful, a pile of fresh catmint in the foreground, warm golden lighting.
